<doc> WEBLETS -- A HOP weblet for releasing weblets. 

== Description ==

[[weblets]] is a Hop program meant for releasing weblets.



== Services ==

Here are the services defined by WEBLETS:

  - ++[[weblets]]++: This is the main entry point of HopSlide. It takes one 
 optional argument: the name of the file containing the presentation. 
 If not provided, HopSlide lets users browse the server disk in order to 
 select it.
  
</doc>
